name: generic
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: shared by, typical of, or relating to a whole group of similar things, rather than to any particular thing

example.eg: The new range of engines all had a generic problem with their fan blades.
example.egtrans: 这一新系列的发动机有一个通病，就是风机叶片有问题。

trans_examp.trans_en: generic drugs or other products do not have a trademark and are sold without the name of the company that produced them
trans_examp.trans_cn: （药物或商品）无专利的，未注册的

name: generic
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a product, especially a drug, that is no longer owned or legally controlled by a particular company
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指药品）无专利的，不受某一厂商控制的

example.eg: The biggest difference between the brand-name drugs and the generics is price.
example.egtrans: 品牌药品和仿制药品之间的最大差别是价格。
